scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd functions && npm run setenv && cd .. && firebase deploy
scripts.deployhost: npm run build && cd functions && npm run setenv && cd .. && firebase deploy --except functions
scripts.deployfunctions: cd functions && npm run setenv && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.switchDEV: cp .env-DEV .env && cp .firebaserc-DEV .firebaserc && cp functions/.serviceAccountKey-DEV.json functions/.serviceAccountKey.json && cp functions/.env-strava-config-DEV.json functions/.env-strava-config.json && cp ../bulkloader/.serviceAccountKey-DEV.json ../bulkloader/.serviceAccountKey.json && cp ../bulkloader/.env-strava-config-DEV.json ../bulkloader/.env-strava-config.json && firebase use triclubchallengedev
scripts.switchMST: cp .env-MST .env && cp .firebaserc-MST .firebaserc && cp functions/.serviceAccountKey-MST.json functions/.serviceAccountKey.json && cp functions/.env-strava-config-MST.json functions/.env-strava-config.json && cp ../bulkloader/.serviceAccountKey-MST.json ../bulkloader/.serviceAccountKey.json && cp ../bulkloader/.env-strava-config-MST.json ../bulkloader/.env-strava-config.json && firebase use triclubchallengedev
scripts.switchATC: cp .env-ATC .env && cp .firebaserc-ATC .firebaserc && cp functions/.serviceAccountKey-ATC.json functions/.serviceAccountKey.json && cp functions/.env-strava-config-ATC.json functions/.env-strava-config.json && cp ../bulkloader/.serviceAccountKey-ATC.json ../bulkloader/.serviceAccountKey.json && cp ../bulkloader/.env-strava-config-ATC.json ../bulkloader/.env-strava-config.json && firebase use teamatc-challenge
scripts.switchSAA: cp .env-SAA .env && cp .firebaserc-SAA .firebaserc && cp functions/.serviceAccountKey-SAA.json functions/.serviceAccountKey.json && cp functions/.env-strava-config-SAA.json functions/.env-strava-config.json && cp ../bulkloader/.serviceAccountKey-SAA.json ../bulkloader/.serviceAccountKey.json && cp ../bulkloader/.env-strava-config-SAA.json ../bulkloader/.env-strava-config.json && firebase use saaclubchallenge
